showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . Store has very poor merchandise selection for a store this size. 4:40 am and waited over 30 minutes for a shower to be cleaned while several showers were empty but the store was too understaffed to have someone clean one. Several ‚Ä¶

My shower was not cleaned! Good thing I always bring cleaning supplies just in case.

This pilot certainly does not clean its showers. After all the reviews they only give you a lazy reply and do nothing about it. Waited 30mins for a shower while employees were just trying to be busy not cleaning the next shower

I would of not gave this a 1 star review but would you learn how to clean the shower room I would thank you at least make sure there is at least TP in the bathroom come on my five year old can do better

Very friendly employees working here. It really can turn your day around if you're having a bad day. Showers were clean. Coffee was great. Was definitely not sure I'd get a shower here because there was so few. But walked in and there were ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I like this TA you can alway find parking here no matter how late. They do have another men restroom upstairs where the shower are if the downstairs stall are all tooken. They have food options late night. But restaurants here does closed ‚Ä¶
Charges truckers 20-25 for parking and shower but can‚Äôt get new squeegees for the fuel isles I was better off not even cleaning my windows and mirrors

Ice cold showers. Shower 2 was pure ice. Jumped in water and realized no heat. Was too embarrassed to get dressed again, half showered, and bugging about no hot water; so I just left.

Not a good stop.

I stopped here for my 10 hour break. Was hoping to get a shower. There are no people to clean the showers. On my way in a driver was mad because he needed a oil change on his truck but they had no filters and oil here at the t/a.... Sounds ‚Ä¶
Restaurant is clean and fast. Salad bar was fully stocked and fresh. Service was good. Parking for trucks is good easy back in lots of space. Shower was spotless. Great job TA! Will stop again.
‚Ä¶ $15 for a shower. 1st one still had the towels from previous person still on the floor. 2nd one had garage in it. ‚Ä¶
If you can‚Äôt give me shower with just 1100$ spend on fuel without ultraone card Im not stoping here anymore. You lose business, loves win

It was a little slow today. Card reader wasn't working and for some reason the second seat shower system wasn't working. Otherwise not much change. I still am hopeful that the restaurant will reopen but not holding my breath. üòÇ ‚Ä¶

The first shower room was gross, hair all over the sink and toilet, so they gave us another shower room way cleaner. No hot food, I'm starting to think food stops being a concern after 8pm. So if you want to eat something they doesn't go in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Restaurant is closed down. Wait 2 hours to get a shower and they are out of clean towels to dry off.   There are plenty of TA/Petro close enough around to avoid this place forever.  5 of the diesel island lanes were closed as well. What ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ , they have Krunchers chicken for hot food, large vape selection, bathrooms were nice and clean on my visit. i did not pay to park so unsure on price, i didnt shower here either, but for a quick food/fuel/bathroom stop it is pleasant!

$20 for parking. I asked if I buy fuel do I get a discount? They said 100 gallons will get me a $15 shower for free. But no discounts on parking. Update. I decided to take a shower here. The water took 4 minutes to get hot. There are no ‚Ä¶
Great place, fresh sandwiches available. Shower also available $10.00. Plenty of parking.
Had a nice shower

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was spacious and clean, with lots of hot water with good water pressure. ‚Ä¶

Great place. It clean and the worker is tois friendly. But I decided to stop by to get a shower and the shower smell like weed. Probably will not be getting a shower here again. Some people can't stand the smell of it. And for it to smell ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ fresh without a poo taint. You aren't wiping. You don't self care. I definitely don't want to follow you through a shower. I have no clue what you are thinking but can you PLEASE STOP FILTHING WHERE I WORK AND SLEEP AND PLAY WITH MY DOG. ‚Ä¶

Management is terrible. They cannot explain the simple things I took almost hundred gallons diesel and they told me I‚Äôm not allowed to have a free shower. It is my last fueling up on the love truckstop
First time I ever gave a loves 1 star. Don't know what's going on but their shower system is down. Loves batter straighten up or all my trucks won't be stopping at loves anymore.

I asked the cashier if I had any shower credits on my Love's card. I did not. Other Love's offer a courtesy shower. This Love's did not. I think this is extremely inconsiderate. Offering a courtesy shower wouldn't have killed the guy at the ‚Ä¶

Whenever I feel like the world is running out of good people, God delivers. Tracey G, used what looked like her only $20 dollars she had on her to buy me a shower. I tried to stop her but she was just too passionate about it. It broke my ‚Ä¶

Better have an actual loves card or no shower for truck drivers that keeps loves in business. Dog collar girl says having a picture of my actual loves card bar code doesn‚Äôt work and that I‚Äôm trying to scam ‚Ä¶

Pro: Tidy and clean, overall great shower experience, and pleasant staff.
Con: No salads, shower temp Flux, truck lot small.
